exceptions.name: 389 Directory Server Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Specified to be associated with GPL-2.0-only

exceptions.name: Autoconf exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: Autoconf exception 3.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-3.0-only or GPL-3.0-and-later

exceptions.name: Autoconf generic exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Gnulib uses a variant wording of this exception.

exceptions.name: Autoconf generic exception for GPL-3.0
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is the same as Autoconf-exception-generic, but it adds a sentence related to GPL-3.0.

exceptions.name: Bison exception 2.2
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later or GPL-3.0-only or GPL-3.0-and-later

exceptions.name: Classpath exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: This is an exception from the FSF for Classpath. Independent-modules-exception is very similar, but has a separate id due to it being used with LGPL and a different lead-in that Classpath-exception-2.0.

exceptions.name: CLISP exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: DigiRule FOSS License Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: eCos exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later. Similar to Macro and Inlines Functions Exception

exceptions.name: Erlang/OTP Linking Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is based on the suggested template from the Free Software Foundation's FAQ about the GPL.

exceptions.name: Fawkes Runtime Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Combines the Classpath exception with the Macros and Inline Functions exception.

exceptions.name: FLTK exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Specified to be associated with LGPL-2.0-only. On Fedora List as "FLTK License".

exceptions.name: fmt exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with MIT.

exceptions.name: Font exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: FreeRTOS Exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception was used by the FreeRTOS project with GPL-2.0 until Amazon acquired the project and changed the license to MIT. Note, the exact text of the exception varied over the years and on different pages.

exceptions.name: GCC Runtime Library exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-or-later. Sometimes also referred to as "linking exception."

exceptions.name: GCC    Runtime Library exception 2.0 - note variant
exceptions.licenseComments: This is the same as GCC-exception-2.0 but adds a second paragraph.

exceptions.name: GCC Runtime Library exception 3.1
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-3.0-and-later

exceptions.name: Gmsh exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception has been used with GPL-2.0

exceptions.name: GNAT exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception has been used with both versions 2.0 and 3.0 of the GPL.

exceptions.name: GNOME examples exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception has been used with CC-BY-SA-3.0.

exceptions.name: GNU Compiler Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is the same as SWI-exception but delineates that the library is compiled with a GNU compiler, which is narrower than a or any free software compiler.

exceptions.name: GNU JavaMail exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL (any version)

exceptions.name: GPL-3.0 389 DS Base Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is similar to GPL-3.0-linking-source-exception but applies to the "licensed" work, rather than the library.

exceptions.name: GPL-3.0 Interface Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is based on the suggested template from the Free Software Foundation's FAQ about the GPL. This exception enables linking with differently licensed modules over the specified interface, while ensuring that users would still receive source code as they normally would under the GPL.

exceptions.name: GPL-3.0 Linking Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is based on the suggested template from the Free Software Foundation's FAQ about the GPL. This variant does not include the second optional sentence regarding Corresponding Source. For a variant with that sentence, please see GPL-3.0-linking-source-exception.

exceptions.name: GPL-3.0 Linking Exception (with Corresponding Source)
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is based on the suggested template from the Free Software Foundation's FAQ about the GPL. This variant includes the second optional sentence regarding Corresponding Source. For a variant without that sentence, please see GPL-3.0-linking-exception.

exceptions.name: GPL Cooperation Commitment 1.0
exceptions.licenseComments: This is the GPL Cooperation Commitment for projects. It is distinct from the GPL Cooperation Commitment for companies or individuals in that it applies at the project level for all contributions going forward as of the date it is adopted.

exceptions.name: GStreamer Exception (2005)
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is the original exception added to the GNOME Videos (né totem") project in 2005. Use GStreamer-exception-2008 instead.

exceptions.name: GStreamer Exception (2008)
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is based on the exception added to the GNOME Videos (né “totem”) project in 2005. Earlier versions of the exception had the project name hard-coded in the exception, and only implicitly mentioned the ability to reuse code without carrying the exception.

exceptions.name: harbour exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception has some similarities to SANE-exception. It is written to be used with GPL.

exceptions.name: i2p GPL+Java Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: Independent Module Linking exception
exceptions.licenseComments: The main part of this exception is essentially the same as Classpath-exception-2.0. However, due to it being used with LGPL and a different lead-in that Classpath-exception-2.0, it has its own id.

exceptions.name: KiCad Libraries Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with CC-BY-SA-4.0

exceptions.name: LGPL-3.0 Linking Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Unlike GPL-3.0-linking-exception, this exception is not based on a suggested template from the Free Software Foundation's FAQ about the GPL. It is being added as it has been used in several projects as a linking exception to LGPL-3.0.

exceptions.name: Linux Syscall Note
exceptions.licenseComments: This note is used with the Linux kernel to clarify how user space API files should be treated.

exceptions.name: LLGPL Preamble
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with LGPL-2.1

exceptions.name: LLVM Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception was created specifically to be used with Apache-2.0

exceptions.name: LZMA exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Used by the LZMA compression module for NSIS to apply an exception to CPL-1.0

exceptions.name: Macros and Inline Functions Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later for older versions of GCC. This is similar to the eCos Exception.

exceptions.name: mxml Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This is similar to the LLVM-exception, but omits the first paragraph.

exceptions.name: Nokia Qt LGPL exception 1.1
exceptions.licenseComments: DEPRECATED: Use Qt-LGPL-exception-1.1

exceptions.name: OCaml LGPL Linking Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Adopted by OCaml core in 2001 here: https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/commit/02ef950033b81fe371759f024faa55f361ba83a6#diff-9879d6db96fd29134fc802214163b95a (git-svn-id: http://caml.inria.fr/svn/ocaml/trunk@4146 f963ae5c-01c2-4b8c-9fe0-0dff7051ff02) LGPL clause typo (was: 3; intended:2; fixed-to:2) fixed in 2007 here: https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/commit/2d26308ad4d34ea0c00e44db62c4c24c7031c78c#diff-9879d6db96fd29134fc802214163b95a

exceptions.name: Open CASCADE Exception 1.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Open CASCADE Technology version 6.7.0 and later are governed by (LGPL-2.1-only with this exception.) A specific license (OCCT-PL) is applied to Open CASCADE Technology version 6.6.0 and earlier.

exceptions.name: OpenVPN OpenSSL Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL 2.0

exceptions.name: PCRE2 exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception has been used with BSD-3-Clause.

exceptions.name: PS/PDF font exception (2017-08-17)
exceptions.licenseComments: Author-suggested standard header language recommends use with AGPL-3.0-only

exceptions.name: INRIA QPL 1.0 2004 variant exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is primarily used with QPL-1.0-INRIA-2004

exceptions.name: Qt GPL exception 1.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with the GPL-3.0.

exceptions.name: Qt LGPL exception 1.1
exceptions.licenseComments: Used with LGPL-2.1-only, which is mentioned explicitly in the exception text.

exceptions.name: Qwt exception 1.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Specified to be associated with LGPL-2.1. On Fedora List as "Qwt License 1.0".

exceptions.name: RRDtool FLOSS exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is generally used with GPL-2.0

exceptions.name: Solderpad Hardware License v2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Used with Apache-2.0. Italicized text from original license is not reflected in this copy but can be seen in license steward's version at https://solderpad.org/licenses/SHL-2.0/

exceptions.name: Solderpad Hardware License v2.1
exceptions.licenseComments: Used with Apache-2.0

exceptions.name: SWI exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception is closely similar to GNU-compiler-exception but delineates that the library is compiled with a Free Software compiler, which is slightly broader than a GNU compiler.

exceptions.name: Swift Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This exception was created specifically to be used with Apache-2.0

exceptions.name: U-Boot exception 2.0
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: Unmodified Binary Distribution exception
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-or-later

exceptions.name: WxWindows Library Exception 3.1
exceptions.licenseComments: Typically used with GPL-2.0-only or GPL-2.0-and-later

exceptions.name: x11vnc OpenSSL Exception
exceptions.licenseComments: This is very similar to openvpn-openssl-exception with a couple key differences.
